name: Half automatic electronic Leak Testing Device MED1
description:
for the installation into the in-line chain conveyor,
for the controll of the bottle valve on the gas leackage,
consists of:
****************************************************************
- 1 x gallows with spring balancer;
- 1 x test bell;
- 1 x pneumatic pump;
- 1 x gas sensor, ex-proof;
- 1 x evaluating device 230 V, 50 Hz,
(non ex-proof, for the installation outside of ex-zone)
- 1 x pneumatic controller with optical display
to signal the gas leackage
Operating: manually
Complete, ready for operation
